remarks: Value of the subword extractor as function with domain.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Mar-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 2-May-2020.)
statement: swrdvalfn $p |- ( ( S e. Word V /\ F e. ( 0 ... L ) /\ L e. ( 0 ... ( # ` S ) ) ) -> ( S substr <. F , L >. ) Fn ( 0 ..^ ( L - F ) ) ) $.
